title: Cannot connect to VNC put using vnc-4_1_3-x86_win32_viewer it work
author: paoloholzl
body_snippet:
All other connections work perfectly,
But I try unsuccesflully this connection:

This is the log:
2022-07-12 15:12:25,368 [1] INFO  - mRemoteNG 1.77.1.27654 starting.

comments.author: Neustradamus
comments.snippet:
@paoloholzl: Have you tried with UltraVNC?
- https://github.com/ultravnc

comments.author: paoloholzl
comments.snippet:
Sure.
If I connect using UltraVNC I obtain that is a logon without credential and trust is required.
Then selecting continue it work perfectly.
I have also try using connectRemoteNG with right click connect with options, connect without credentials (but dosn't work)

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.
